sentences.en: A lot of money was spent on the equipment of the new hospital.
sentences.cn: 新医院的装备花费巨大。

sentences.en: a very useful piece of equipment
As the equipment was unpacked, I led Lee around the overgrown garden.
sentences.cn: 取出设备后，我带着李在花草蔓生的花园里转了一圈。

sentences.en: Better driv-ing equipment will improve track adhesion in slippery conditions.
sentences.cn: 较好的驾驶设备能够提升在湿滑路面上的抓地力。

sentences.en: Customs officials have made a series of contradictory statements about the equipment.
sentences.cn: 海关官员们对这种设备作出了一系列互相矛盾的陈述。

sentences.en: Equipment must be supervised if children are in the house.
sentences.cn: 如果孩子们在屋里，必须有人监管设备。

sentences.en: Every second her equipment was off line cost the company money.
sentences.cn: 她的设备每停产一秒钟，公司都要损失钱。

sentences.en: Having the right equipment at hand will be enormously helpful.
sentences.cn: 手头上有合适的设备将会帮上大忙。

sentences.en: He was found by a police helicopter using thermal imaging equipment.
sentences.cn: 一架警用直升机借助热成像设备找到了他。

sentences.en: I get very nervous because I'm using a lot of expensive equipment.
sentences.cn: 因为正在使用很多昂贵的设备，所以我非常紧张。

sentences.en: Police keep track of the kidnapper using electronic surveillance equipment.
sentences.cn: 警方利用电子监视设备跟踪绑架者。
一些全新的计算机设备

sentences.en: Suppliers add computer consumables, office equipment and furniture to their product range.
sentences.cn: 供货商在其产品范围中增加了计算机耗材、办公设备和家具。

sentences.en: The equipment was taken down the shaft in pieces.
sentences.cn: 该设备被拆卸成几部分送下了井。

sentences.en: Their health-care system suffers from queues, shortages and ropey equipment.
sentences.cn: 他们的医疗体系有很多不足：要排队等候，资源短缺，设备陈旧。

sentences.en: They emphasised that their equipment was for peaceful and not military purposes.
sentences.cn: 他们强调他们的设备用于和平而非战争目的。

sentences.en: This led Zagreb's twin town, Mainz, to donate £70,000-worth of high-quality equipment.
sentences.cn: 这使得萨格勒布的友好城市美因茨捐赠了价值7万英镑的高品质装备。

sentences.en: Within five hours, the equipment will be humming away again.
sentences.cn: 用不了5小时，设备就又能嗡嗡地运转了。

phrases.tran_cn: 自动化设备；自动化装置
电设备；电器设备，用电设备；电气设备；电器类
电气设备；电力设备；电器设备
电力设备，发电设备；动力设备
测试设备；试验设备；检测设备

trans.tran_en: the tools, machines etc that you need to do a particular job or activity
